div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Beginning March 23 USD 355 will be serving lunches for the remainder of the school year following the Summer Lunch Program guidelines. These meals are free to all children ages 1 -18. The child must be present at pick-up to obtain the meal.
Meals can be picked up 11:30 to 12:15 Monday thru Friday.
Pickup will be at the Grade School circle drive on the east side or curbside at the MS/HS commons area entry door on the east side.
No one will be allowed into the buildings for any reason.
Meals will not be served on April 10 or 13.
Menu can be found - Click Here

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Bond Issue Steering Committee Interest Form - Click Here for Form

p.strong: For a hard copy form, please either visit the USD 355 District Office, the Ellinwood School/Community Library, or contact Ashley Porter ( aporter@usd355.org or 620-564-3226 ).

em.strong: The USD 355 Ellinwood Public Schools Board of Education is interested in receiving applications for membership to the Bond Issue Steering Committee. This committee will represent district patrons and work collaboratively with the Board of Education in determining facility needs for the district on a potential bond issue.

p.em: Ellinwood Public Schools educates students to become self-actualized citizens who promote growth to society.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

ul.li: USD 355 prohibits discrimination against any individual on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, age, or religion in the admission or access to, or treatment of employment in the district's programs and activities.

In compliance with Executive Order 11246; Title II of the Education Amendments of 1976; Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended by the Equal Employment Opportunity Act of 1972; Title IX regulations implementing education amendments of 1972; Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973; IDEA Act; ADA Act of 1990 and all other Federal, State, School Rules, Laws, and Regulations and Policies, Ellinwood Public Schools, USD 355 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, age or religion in the admission or access to, or treatment or employment in the district's programs and activities.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

small.strong: ELLINWOOD PUBLIC SCHOOLS | 300 NORTH SCHILLER | ELLINWOOD, KS 67526
